website_summaries.verdict: The best deal available if you are looking for a grain-free dog food. Though the bag is slightly smaller than others, so is the price tag.
pros: A dog-proven formula by a top name in dog food that is slightly less costly than other brands
cons: While several consumers indicated their dogs didn't like it, others rave about even finicky eaters devouring it

customer_reviews.title: NOT THE CURRENT/SAME PRODUCT AS OTHER DISTRIBUTORS
customer_reviews.text: this MUST be old food. It is NOT what is currently sold by other distributors. I only noticed because my dog has bad allergies and this food was great for her from chewy. I bought two bags on amazon and she tore her face off from allergies. Went back to buying supposedly the same food from chewy and her allergies are gone and her hair is finally growing back. After closer inspection, THE INGREDIENTS ARE NOT THE SAME regardless of the picture of the bag and name being the same.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Constantly out of stock
customer_reviews.text: I am unable to recommend this because 2/3 of the time over the last year, it is "unavailable" out of stock or something. Look to something else if you want to provide a consistent food for your dogs.
customer_reviews.author: EddieAmazonTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: My dog loves it!
customer_reviews.text: I tried the grain free after 10 years of not even my vet could understand what was going on with the rash my dog had developed. After 3 days of using the new food, her rash completely disappeared. Her fur became thicker, shinyer, and softer than it ever had been and she was no longer scratching and biting herself. I would say it was one of the best changes I have ever made.
customer_reviews.author: Fran Coderre

customer_reviews.title: Toxic "clouds" no more!
customer_reviews.text: Well, I don't like it, but my dog really seems to! :) I got really tired of the noxious fermented-corn "clouds" that used to emanate from my dog's behind when he ate grain-filled food. Nothing like being enveloped by invisible stench while watching tv with the family. This food has eliminated that particular issue and he really seems to enjoy the taste.
customer_reviews.author: Cyndia63

customer_reviews.title: Yum? Ask a dog.
customer_reviews.text: Ingredients look good. In terms of taste, well I can't say, BUT my dog eats if aggressively, so I assume that it is because she loves it. We tried other flavors of this brand, and she does not like the other quite as much, OR the lamb flavor that they make gives her the poops unfortunately. She does not eat anything except the occasional dog treat, and she has consistently EXCELLENT, dare I say PERFECT bm's. I will re-purchase this once she eats through the entire bag. I would definitely recommend this to people if they were interested. So there you have it. Great dog food. I never thought I would say that.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Very odd odor -- old product?
customer_reviews.text: We noticed that this batch of dog food had a very different odor. The dogs finally ate it with some reluctance, but I was wondering if Purina had created a different formula, since I also noticed that the packaging was 1 pound less than previous. I bought a new bag (this time from Walmart) and it smelled the same as the old stuff and the dogs liked it better immediately. So, careful with this ...
customer_reviews.author: Novelist

customer_reviews.title: My Pups were Over the Moon with their new dog food!
customer_reviews.text: Great Dog Food! My dogs are picky and sensitive to a bunch of ingredients to common dog food, but had absolutely no issues with this Purina dog food. I felt it also made their coats look nice and shiny. Very pleased that they love their new dog food that it won't take 4 days to find or a week to receive by mail.
customer_reviews.author: HartofaQueen

customer_reviews.title: Not the same product pictured!!
customer_reviews.text: Please change your picture... this is the 2nd time I have ordered this and it is not the same as the advertised picture. My dog prefers and I would like to purchase the bag / product pictured on the side with the "rich protein rich shreds" this bag and the last bag i bought from you no longer have those... please update asap or provide some clarification as to why i am getting something other than pictured on the site/product advertised.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Faucheux

customer_reviews.title: Dog tested, mom approved
customer_reviews.text: I’ve never seen my dog so enthusiastic about her food! She’s 9, and usually picks at her food, sometimes doesn’t even finish her dish before the day’s end. When this arrived, she was immediately interested and snarfs her food down immediately and licks her dish! I’m so happy to make her happy! I love that the first ingredient is tuna, and it’s economical.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Good buy.
customer_reviews.text: We switch between this food and Wellness, my dog, Kayla, she loves this food...my nephew will take it and she will do tricks for this food. We like the variety within the line of grain-free as well. It doesnt seem to change her digestive system at all so we do keep her pretty regular on this or the Wellness brand both brands are grain-free. The only difference is with this one you do need to give her alittle more than with Wellness as I think Purina has smaller chunks of food. Good brand to try.
customer_reviews.author: heatherm14

customer_reviews.title: Purina must have changed recipe and it’s no longer safe for dog
customer_reviews.text: We used Purina grain free for the past four years and it was perfect. My dog has allergies and this food was great for her. Last month, we bought a bag and the dog can’t eat it. She gets sick every time she eats Purina dry food. They must have changed something in ingredients or recipe. Sadly, we have to switch to another product.
customer_reviews.author: NN

customer_reviews.title: Not sure
customer_reviews.text: My two small dogs both got very sick after eating this. I bought a 13 lb. bag and it was fine until the last 1/3 of the bag. After I fed them their evening meal they both got sick and spent the next 3 days laying, not eating or drinking water, staring ahead barely moving. Finally at essentially the same time, they both slowly revived and got back to normal but that was so scary. The food is the only common denominator and since it’s actually a quality brand, I think, no idea why, unless something affected the last of the bag?
customer_reviews.author: Sheila Joi

customer_reviews.title: My sensitive stomach pup does well with it.
customer_reviews.text: We used another brand of food, but are unable to get it anymore. We tried this brand, and both my dogs loved it. Trying to save money, we purchased a "meat as the first ingredient" food and my younger dog was terribly sick for the 3 days. Bought more of this and she's doing much better. The dogs like it. And, we have had no problems with it at all.
customer_reviews.author: V in AZ

customer_reviews.title: New Formula??
customer_reviews.text: Been ordering this dog food for years. My dogs love it. Opened up our monthly bag and discovered there is now a new formula? It had what they are calling "protein chunks" or something. Dog seemed to still love it but was very surprised to see the change. Hope it won't cause any issues since we are out of the old stuff and nothing to properly transition our dogs with to the new stuff.
customer_reviews.author: Kali

customer_reviews.title: Puppy loves it
customer_reviews.text: My dog is on a grain-free/gluten-free diet because of allergies, and she loves his stuff. She stopped eating her EXPENSIVE blue buffalo, I think it tasted bland to her! I started her on this instead and she will eat right away! I was skeptical since I usually buy her expensive wholesome foods that I trust, but this has worked for her like a charm and her vet thinks it’s done great on her skin and keeps her at a perfect weight
customer_reviews.author: rebeccajayne

customer_reviews.title: not whats pictured
customer_reviews.text: The product is the same name, but it does not have the chicken pieces in it anymore like the picture shows, my dogs loved this food with those pieces but now its not in there anymore. Would've just bought from the local store instead of online If I knew that.
customer_reviews.author: Brent

customer_reviews.title: wrong food inside
customer_reviews.text: Even though the sack says its the right dog food it is not.The kernels are all small and there are no! big chucks. I am not going to send it back because I don't have the time and the energy but I really don't see how this is possible. I feel you should check this out with the manufacturer. I know I can't be the only one that has made a complaint. After you check this out I would like you to send me the correct bag at no cost to me. I am extremely upset over this. I would like a response about this situation.
customer_reviews.author: Delores O.

customer_reviews.title: Great Alternative to Glycobalance
customer_reviews.text: My dog is diabetic and she hates the Glycobalance. I started using this flavor of Beyond and she loves it and it works really well with her insulin. I don't need a prescription to buy is the price is a whole lot better than Glycobalance. This was great alternative for my diabetic dog.
customer_reviews.author: Mollie

customer_reviews.title: same food ordered before was not the same food!
customer_reviews.text: The first time I ordered the dog food there were lots of big chunks of protein chicken bits, and the second time I ordered the food there were none in the whole bag of food! My dog wont even eat it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: DECENT FOOD FOR A DECENT PRICE
customer_reviews.text: Switched him to this brand after his other dog food was discontinued. Like it because: 1. Chicken is the first ingredient listed 2. Chicken meal is the second ingredient listed 3. Has no soy or corn 4. Completely grain free 5. All chicken sourced from US/Canada 6. My dog scarfs it up 7. Not horribly expensive Are there higher quality foods? Yes, but they're also quite a bit pricier. I think for the price and given that the meat is sourced from N. America and that the facility is in the US, I'm happy enough and my dog seems to be pretty happy too.
customer_reviews.author: Long Island

customer_reviews.title: Good For Gassy Poodles!
customer_reviews.text: Our standard poo' passes the WORST gas! He's seven years old, and has always eaten regular Iams dog food, but every night he'd get the worst gas, fumigating us out of house and home. I decided recently it's his kibble, and switched to this grain-free brand. WHAT A DIFFERENCE IT MAKES! He's not as gassy! The only time he's gassy is if we toss him a tree made with grain. This is his food from now on!
customer_reviews.author: SparklesTop Contributor: Gardening

customer_reviews.title: No Chicken chunks in bag
customer_reviews.text: I am bit dissapointed with this food. My friend recommended it because her dogs love it so I gave it a try. I bought the 3lb bag first to try and see if my dog liked it, she loved it and woofed it down. So i decided to buy a laerger bag. Second purchase was from Target because I was out of time/food. The bag didnt come with the chicken chunks. I received another bag from amazon this week only it was the 13lb bag, and it's also missing the chicken chunks. Not sure what is going on but will have to switch her food again because she refuses to eat it.
customer_reviews.author: Summer B

customer_reviews.title: Unhappy dog thinks your company stinks
customer_reviews.text: My dog loved this food we tried forever to find something she would eat. Then you change the formula no warning to people who depend on you to feed their dogs good food. She even hates the smell the new formula sucks. Why do you people do this?
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Dogs love it and their People do too!
customer_reviews.text: Trouble finding in stores and my two little doxies digest this VERY well. And less volume of------- well you know. The fish and no grain are amazing. I have Prime shipment and this makes it such a good investment, again. And my dogs love this food!
customer_reviews.author: Anna Duncan

customer_reviews.title: Great for dogs with itchy skin issues
customer_reviews.text: I have a 5 year old retired greyhound who I had been feeding a grain free turkey and sweet potato food when he started rubbing A LOT! I switched him to the same brand's Salmon and sweet potato with no improvement. So I tried this and within a week, his rubbing subsided and the puffiness around his eyes was almost gone. In addition, he absolutely loves this food.
customer_reviews.author: Lois Karlid

customer_reviews.title: Love this stuff.
customer_reviews.text: My dogs loved this flavor, its a little moister then I like, I actually bought it as a dog treat for training and what not and since its a little more oily, I won't be purchasing it again, but as dog food, it woulda have been amazing , instead I buy the Purina Beyond Superfood Blend Natural Salmon, Egg & Pumpkin Recipe Dry Dog Food as their actual dog food, I like it better because it has the pumpkin fiber my dogs needs.
customer_reviews.author: Ddaeng

customer_reviews.title: Has shreds of chicken in it.
customer_reviews.text: As you can see from the photos, Amazon shows this dog food as not having chicken in it, per the manufacturer, and it showed up with chicken. The actual pieces of chicken is what makes my dog break out in hives. That's why I paid $58 for 2 13 pound bags of it instead of the larger bag....because there was not supposed to be chicken shreds in it.
customer_reviews.author: Ron

customer_reviews.title: Great dog food for a diabetic dog.
customer_reviews.text: This Purina grain free dry dog food is loaded with protein and is missing the corn, wheat etc fillers that many cheaper dog foods have. My dog is diabetic and this dog food is recommended for this condition. My Chocolate Lab loves this stuff and we are able to maintain his blood sugar levels with this product. It is a little costly for a large dog but is inline with all the high quality grain free dog foods. It would be a great dog food for a dog that is not diabetic also.
customer_reviews.author: DJH

customer_reviews.title: Great dog food
customer_reviews.text: Great dog food .Had given our dog another natural dog food .It didn't agree with him and had loose stools while eating it . On Beyond food he hasn't had any problems. One of the best things about getting it from Amazon is that is on Subscribe and Save with usually a 15%dicount if we order at least 5 items . There also is no carrying from the store to home.
customer_reviews.author: Dianne Roberts

customer_reviews.title: Good for runny poops.
customer_reviews.text: My dog will eat almost anything. When we transitioned to this new dog food she refused to it initially. And when she did eat it finally it gave her the runs for 2 weeks. She never ate a full bowl unlike almost every other dog food we have tried.
customer_reviews.author: Z Picky Shoppa

customer_reviews.title: Worth a try?
customer_reviews.text: Seemed to be a great product, our dog has a grain and dairy allergy. Problem is, she hated this food. We had to mix other foods or left overs in it to get her to eat it. She flat out refused, we are using a different grain/ free dog food and she eats it without adding other food. Worth a try, I guess
customer_reviews.author: Shopper 402

customer_reviews.title: Good dog food but expensive
customer_reviews.text: My dog has a sensitive stomach and has allergies. Vet recommended grain free diet and switched to this kind. Dog likes it and for the most part, dogs skin has improved and she hasn't gotten over weight on this new diet. This brand is expensive for only 23 lb bag and amazon is the cheapest place I found so far. Helps if you are a prime member but man do I wish this stuff was a bit less expensive.
customer_reviews.author: Natalie Itliong Fechter

customer_reviews.title: Helps with my Dogs Acne
customer_reviews.text: I adopted a Neopolitan with severe skin issues and tried every dog food and medicine imaginable. This seems to be the only product that clears up his acne by 80%. There are still some bloody, deep pus boils, but not nearly as many! I hated to have this delivered, but most of the time my local stores are out or have an old, open bag. This way, I know my dog's on a good schedule and my furniture won't be covered with the contents of his zits.
customer_reviews.author: PipSqueek

customer_reviews.title: DOG FOOD - why is it in the same packaging as the cat food!,
customer_reviews.text: Thought this was cat food. Should make the description more clear as the bag looks just like the cat food. Now I’m stuck with a giant bag of dog food when I have a cat. It’s too heavy to haul to the post office to return. Very annoying.
customer_reviews.author: Judy

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff.
customer_reviews.text: My dog has finally stopped scratching! After years of trying medicines and creams, I decided to try grain-free food. It took her a few weeks to warm up to it but now she gobbles it down as soon as I sit it down in the floor for her. She loves it and no more skin issues!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Cox

customer_reviews.title: My dog will eat it!
customer_reviews.text: I rescued a dog. She would eat nothing but cooked pork stew chunks. I tried and tried just about every dry dog food on the market, until a neighbor gave me a partial bag. Peanut the Plump actually LIKED It! And she started to lose weight from that fatty diet she was used to. This food is a tad more expensive, but well worth it to me, and to Peanut, the not so plump now, doggy!
customer_reviews.author: Skipdallas

customer_reviews.title: Wrong flavor Beyond was sent.  Check before opening your bag!!
customer_reviews.text: Wrong product sent. I dumped the bag into my container and discarded the bag, so am not sure what flavor they sent. It doesn’t have the soft yellowish kibble and my dog refuses to touch it. It’s obviously too late to return the wrong product. BE SURE TO CHECK THE OUTSIDE OF THE BAG BEFORE YOU OPEN IT.
customer_reviews.author: Dede Kar

customer_reviews.title: My dog loves it!!!
customer_reviews.text: My Rohdesian Ridgeback really enjoys this food! I purchase the other flavors and rotate them out so that she does not get bored. She prefers the small kibble over the larger ones. This kibble is thin and almost the size of a dime.
customer_reviews.author: Ody

customer_reviews.title: Infested in mealworms
customer_reviews.text: Completely infested in mealworms, enjoy contaminating your house and amazon refusing to refund any of the items that caused it or were contaminated by it. Thank god my dogs were smart enough to refuse this garbage. Had to throw out 4 bags of food and several dog bones / dog treats in the same room that got covered on disgusting worms. Amazon employees passed the ticket around about 10 times and all refused to refund even the original item, not to mention the other items this cross contaminated. The worms OBVIOUSLY came from the dog food, pictures attached.
customer_reviews.author: Rusty

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Our dog has refused any other dog food and we were accidentally sent this food about a year ago (apparently someone else had ordered it but because it is technically a grocery item apparently, they cannot accept it back) and the dog loves it. I did some research on it, very good quality, decent price, and to deliver right to our door? Why not?
customer_reviews.author: Spiker0118

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: My dog has been eating this line of dog food for most of her life. She is 4 years old and maintains a healthy weight and a healthy life. She gets excited and loves to gobble this down when we wake up or before we go to bed. Importantly, I think the price is right on these bags.
customer_reviews.author: P. Cox

customer_reviews.title: lifesaver!
customer_reviews.text: My dog scratches herself all night long if she eats grains. Neither of us get any rest, but she has the added discomfort. When this food came out we had tried a few of the other grain frees and she did not want them (particularly fish ones). So I wasn't sure...but boy does she gobble this up! She's happy and feeling great...and we can all rest well these days. I highly recommend this brand of grain free dog food.
customer_reviews.author: iverglynne

customer_reviews.title: I'm Amazed.
customer_reviews.text: My Rebel (dog) would refuse to eat dog food until he was so hungry he had to eat it (he was being stubborn, wanting people food). I reviewed most of the foods listed on Amazon, ordered the Beyond Grain Free, Natural, Adult Dry Dog Food, and recevied it yesterday. I give him a bowl full this morning and HE ATE IT! He likes it!!! Thank you Amazon for carrying this product.
customer_reviews.author: Willie Lou

customer_reviews.title: Seems good
customer_reviews.text: First time trying this product. Dogs seem to like it. A different route for me because I raw feed. They do poop more than on pure raw feeding. I don't eat it so hard for me to judge the flavor.
customer_reviews.author: boop

customer_reviews.title: Very good product
customer_reviews.text: I was out of Our usual beef dog food. I tried a small bag of this product from the grocery store. My dog loved it. I’m so pleased that Amazon carries this product in a larger size and I have the Prime next day delivery convenience.
customer_reviews.author: Indydog

customer_reviews.title: Too Many protein shreds
customer_reviews.text: It seems like Purina is adding more shreds every time I order Beyond. The Dogs don't like them, and I have to pick them out before feeding them. I don't understand why they can't sell Beyond without the shreds. It seems like by the time I remove the shreds I have way less dog food. STOP PUTTING THEM IN THE DOG FOOD. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Janet M. Dignam

customer_reviews.title: Both happy.
customer_reviews.text: My dog is very picky but she loves this food and is eating better than ever so I’m sticking with it. I’m happy with the ingredients and she’s happy with the taste so we both win. And here’s a photo of my dog because why the heck not???
customer_reviews.author: Taylor Davis

customer_reviews.title: MY DOG LOVES THIS!
customer_reviews.text: I was told by my veterinarian, that my little Chihuahua who was having digestive problems, to switch to a dry dog food that was grain free and try seafood or lamb. I purchased this food as it met all the requirements. My dog LOVES it. I put some in a bowl mixed with his old dry food and then placed some in a bowl by itself. Guess which bowl was empty first! He has taken the change without any problems and no more tummy problems. We are both happy!
customer_reviews.author: Marian G.

customer_reviews.title: Where’s the chicken?
customer_reviews.text: I just got a bag delivered. There were no chicken chunks in it as usual. My dogs will not eat it now and I will have to order from somewhere else. What happened to the recipe???
customer_reviews.author: Kendra

customer_reviews.title: Worms/Spider webs
customer_reviews.text: This food really must have been sitting for awhile. When I got the back the folds had old spider webs stuffed in them, and after I had already been feeding this to my dog for days, I found worms in the food. Unfortunate side note, this food smells like vomit.
customer_reviews.author: The Youngs

customer_reviews.title: Will Let Our Dogs and Vet Decide.
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this to top Alli and Pierz dry food. It is sort of expensive for a topper but convenient. Will weigh those points per the kids reaction to their food when used. We enjoy the fact there is no grains, but I need to ask if canned or packaged broth might be just as good.
customer_reviews.author: Cleta Sharp

customer_reviews.title: The kibbles are the right size for any dog
customer_reviews.text: This is the food our local Humane Society thinks is the best nutritionally. My 3 dogs think it is the best dry dog food they've ever tried. Our dogs are small, medium, and large mixed breeds. The size of the kibbles is just right for all of them.
customer_reviews.author: C&S LATOUR

customer_reviews.title: Product Change With No Notice!
customer_reviews.text: I am not happy they changed the product without any notice. This food is now ALL hard kibble as they took out the soft kibble. 🙁
customer_reviews.author: Mari H.

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding
customer_reviews.text: My dog loves this (and other) products from this company. The ingredients, added vitamins and minerals - 👍🏻👍🏻👍🏻
customer_reviews.author: betty m

customer_reviews.title: You end up with dog food when you search cat food
customer_reviews.text: I’m sure it’s great, if I had a dog. My fault for not enlarging the picture so I could see the tiny “dog” on the upper right corner. I entered Beyond cat food in the search. That’s why I thought only cat food would show up. Imagine my surprise when I opened the bag to have larger pieces than normal. I can’t return it because it is open. Just for kicks please have only cat food show up when you search CAT food.
customer_reviews.author: Robyn B.

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY!!!!
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT BUY, this is the end result after just one day of feeding, was fine before and fine after. Don't think it was anybody's fault, but will be last time ordering dog food online. These bags are stored and moved constantly so there's no telling what contaminated this certain bag.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Ingredients have changed
customer_reviews.text: Just so people are informed, I reached out to Purina after receiving my last bag and they are no longer putting the soft pieces in like it advertises
customer_reviews.author: Jade Kunkel

customer_reviews.title: Our pet didn't like the flavor as much as a previous brand
customer_reviews.text: Our pet didn't like the flavor as much as a previous brand, so he has a hard time finishing his food. The switch in brands was due to an allergy, so it may take some time for his taste buds to adjust. We add other treats to the food, so he will eat, but probably won't purchase this flavor again. Ironically, he loves real tuna, real egg, and real salmon.
customer_reviews.author: AL

customer_reviews.title: Great food, suspicious pricing changes
customer_reviews.text: This is great dog food and my very active Pudelpointer is comparable to a pro athlete, he even brings me his bowl when he wants more. I do however have a question on pricing? The first bag I bought about a month ago was 19, the second about 2 weeks ago was 21 and now the price is up to 28 in less than 2 months, how does that happen?
customer_reviews.author: M. Leuck

customer_reviews.title: Made my dog very sick..beware!
customer_reviews.text: Made my dog very sick. Switched from Rachel Ray grain free and my dog hated it but ate it. Funny color and look. Back to RR.
customer_reviews.author: Rhonda Morrison

customer_reviews.title: Bag was taped closed! No way I am using
customer_reviews.text: I received this bag of dog food and it looks as if the manufacturer seal was damaged or never sealed and the bag was just taped closed! There’s no way I feel comfortable feeding this to my pet knowing that it was open, taped closed, and the contents may have been mishandled.
customer_reviews.author: K.B.

customer_reviews.title: Food is complete and balanced. Has everything a dog needs in it’s diet!!
customer_reviews.text: I trust Purina. I know I can feed my dog and it will be complete and balanced for his diet.
customer_reviews.author: Robinreneep

customer_reviews.title: Making my 3 Shih Tzu vomit
customer_reviews.text: My three Shih Tzu have been vomiting within a week of starting then on this food. Has there been a recall and you sold it anyway? If so I want a refund!
customer_reviews.author: Rickie

customer_reviews.title: I was dissappointed
customer_reviews.text: I had high hopes for this dog food for my very picky eaters. But neither of my dogs liked it all that much. But they are both very finicky about what they eat. They didn't exactly dig in readily.
customer_reviews.author: Jack Stevens

customer_reviews.title: no grain dog food
customer_reviews.text: my dogs love this stuff, of all the dog foods I tried this one I pour in the bowl and it's gone in minutes. flavor is hard to rate but seeing my dogs eating it must be good.
customer_reviews.author: rexam1

customer_reviews.title: NOT the same food that
customer_reviews.text: Bought a 3lb bag and it had “protein pieces” in it. My dog LOVED it w no break outs so the ingredients lived up to what was listed. So I purchased a 7lb bag next as my dog is picky. It was not the same, idk if it was old stock of an old kibble but i can’t get my dog to touch it, no matter what I mix in with it. Extremely Disappointed, I had thought I found a great food my dog loved.
customer_reviews.author: Margarita S.

customer_reviews.title: my dog LOVES it
customer_reviews.text: What can I say? My dog loves it and is a healthy limit-grain food. The price is great and it is delivered to my door, so I don't have to lug it home by myself. What else could I ask for?
customer_reviews.author: Marie M.

customer_reviews.title: Unreliable item
customer_reviews.text: The product description says beef is the primary ingredient but the ingredient list has chicken listed first.
customer_reviews.author: AP

customer_reviews.title: Good for allergies to food dogs
customer_reviews.text: My dog is allergic to beef,pork,soy, rice, corn, sweet potato,white potato and alfalfa this is the only good I found with out those things in it
customer_reviews.author: Diana Williams

customer_reviews.title: Win/Win
customer_reviews.text: Good dog food. Fair value. Hard to find BEYOND at stores near me. I dont mind online purchase bcuz I like that it is delivered to my house and my 3 dogs really like it. That translates to win/win for me.
customer_reviews.author: straycat

customer_reviews.title: Picky Dog eats it all!
customer_reviews.text: We have this on self order - which is fantastic as it shows up on the date that it is needed and we never go without. Our dogs tend to be very picky on what they eat, however they are eating this on a regular basis without any problems. I love not having to find with my dogs to eat!
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: It's, uh, healthy.
customer_reviews.text: According to Cassidy, the taste of dollar store dog food is top notch, but she will allow herself to eat the healthy crap when she is not visiting her uncle, who spoils her rotten with the McDonald's version of dog food.
customer_reviews.author: JaydeRaven

customer_reviews.title: Dogs enjoy this
customer_reviews.text: No need to add wet dogfood or people food to get my dogs to eat this!
customer_reviews.author: ESOL Lady

customer_reviews.title: Product name and description on bag don’t match what is in the bag
customer_reviews.text: This is not what is coming in the bag. It lacks the soft/chewy pieces.
customer_reviews.author: Mom of 2 girls (HS&College)

customer_reviews.title: Great price and prime free 2-day shipping is a ...
customer_reviews.text: My dog loves this brand, great price and prime free 2-day shipping is a bonus. Better than going to the major brick and mortar stores as is cheaper and not using fuel for the car. Be sure to select the size bag you want, either 3lb, 13lb or 23lb prior to ordering as a few customers were expecting a 13lb bag but purchased and received the 3lb bag.
customer_reviews.author: Jim B

customer_reviews.title: Good Buy
customer_reviews.text: Great food for my dog with a sensitive belly- no gas and she loves it. We have been buying this food for quite sometime now
customer_reviews.author: gtalitha

customer_reviews.title: Dog's Love this stuff.
customer_reviews.text: I love that this is grain free - and my three dogs love the taste. Only problem is, they are going through it at a faster rate and it's not exactly inexpensive...
customer_reviews.author: Blondy5

customer_reviews.title: Purina products are tested and
customer_reviews.text: My dogs love the change. Still with Purina, just I different flavor. I will buy more of this. Purina offers a large variety of flavors and ingredients to please any dog.
customer_reviews.author: Melody

customer_reviews.title: Great for Allergies
customer_reviews.text: Finally a dog food without flax. It’s hard to find a food for my bulldogs w numerous allergies. But this does the trick!
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Bulldog

customer_reviews.title: My Dog Loves
customer_reviews.text: Our super finicky dog absolutely loves this dry food! A first! We like that it has good ingredients.
customer_reviews.author: rockgirl71

customer_reviews.title: New formula makes my dog sick
customer_reviews.text: This food has a new formula and made my dog sick. Seems very strange that a food he has been eating for 4 years changed without the company mentioning it. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Shopper #1

customer_reviews.title: Better ingredients than most dry dog foods and a more reasonable cost.
customer_reviews.text: My dogs like it. I wish the pieces of kibble were smaller.
customer_reviews.author: Mary H Trueblood

customer_reviews.title: Best Dog Food
customer_reviews.text: My dog, Sophie, has extremely severe allergies. Most dog food makes her allergies act up. This is the most affordable price and best food for her allergies. Most of the ones she can eat are 80$ or more
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: My dog loves it
customer_reviews.text: My pit bull/border collie mix loves this food (and so does my cat >.> ) It usually takes my 10 yr old a few days to get used to a new food, but she immediately chowed into this!
customer_reviews.author: Hexate

customer_reviews.title: Mom's Dog Loves This Food!
customer_reviews.text: The fact that this food is non-GMO is really a plus.
customer_reviews.author: goldensparrow

customer_reviews.title: Healthy meal happy puppies!
customer_reviews.text: My 2 beagle puppies just turned a year old. We had been feeding them puppy food. I put the food out in the morning and often times they didn’t eat till nighttime. I thought they just weren’t hungry. I gave them the sample you sent me and wow they devoted it. I ordered a bag and low and behold first thing in the morning as soon as their bowls were on the floor the food was gone!!! They love it and we are so happy we have a healthy food for them our babies. I’m so glad we received a sample.
customer_reviews.author: Linda St.Clair

customer_reviews.title: My dogs do great on this dog food.
customer_reviews.text: The dogs love this dog food. I love that one of them got sick once or twice a week then I started using the grain free dog food and now gets sick a couple of times a year. The vet says they are all very healthy so I happy all around.
customer_reviews.author: Vickiric

customer_reviews.title: My Bichon likes it!
customer_reviews.text: Finally a dry food my dog likes. Been using Pedigree but usually throw half the bowl away. My little Bichon likes the stuff and he seems to have more pep. 11 years old. Sure, a bit more$$ than most name brands but nothing is to good for my little buddy!
customer_reviews.author: llacosse

customer_reviews.title: Alex Loves It!
customer_reviews.text: My Toy Poodle loves it and that's all I need to know.
customer_reviews.author: Robert G. Mullen

customer_reviews.title: Another Reason To Avoid Commercial Dog Food
customer_reviews.text: This bag of commercial dog food turned rancid after just 3wks. Whether this is a Quality Control issue (maybe a recall is in order), or the Expiration Date was expired before I received it, I’ll never know (exp. date isn’t obvious).
customer_reviews.author: Dog

customer_reviews.title: Good for Skin and Coat Care
customer_reviews.text: My 15 yr old dog was diagnosed with Cushings Syndrome. One of the symptoms is thin itchy skin. I have tried to stay ahead of her symptoms so switched her to grain-free. So far, so good and she likes it.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia Wood

customer_reviews.title: Not for older small dogs.
customer_reviews.text: Bites to big for my Yorkies. This would maybe work for small dogs but not older dogs who have a limited amount of teeth. Also I have one bigger Yorkie (9 lbs) and he simply does not like it.
customer_reviews.author: Blackberry mom

customer_reviews.title: no bad reactions, etc
customer_reviews.text: Decent dog food, she seemed to do okay on it (solid stools, no bad reactions, etc.) but towards the end of the bag, she was over it. She stopped eating the food. I had to order a completely different dog food and mix it, and she would try to eat around it (as hard as that sounds) she would leave more of the Purina food behind. (I could tell because of the size and shape of the foods).
customer_reviews.author: Colleen Marshall

customer_reviews.title: Boston Terrier Approved!
customer_reviews.text: We have 2 Boston Terriers that we recently switched to this food.. Their coats have never looked so healthy, they seem to have a lot more energy, and they love the food so much that they have gained a few pounds! So glad we found this food!
customer_reviews.author: Jessi

customer_reviews.title: A well fed dog is a happy dog!
customer_reviews.text: I greatly prefer the grain free dog foods and never feed my cats any food with grains as they cannot digest them. Our dogs, one Big and one small both like this and it agrees with them. They have no digestive problems and lots of energy.
customer_reviews.author: Darla J. Keefer

customer_reviews.title: Goodbye Anal Gland issues
customer_reviews.text: We have a 5 year old doxie that has Anal Gland issues. We are halfway through the bag and now we saw at least 70% reduction in the smell. Also paired it with the Anal Glands Scoot Away. Get both if your dog has anal gland issues and will drastically become reduced. Since she has been eating this food, her fur is looking super shiny and she has more energy! Will continue to buy this product.
customer_reviews.author: Pen Name

customer_reviews.title: Good I think
customer_reviews.text: I'm sure the beef is fine, my dog will eat it. It just seems like she prefers the Purina Beyond chicken so we'll switch back! Grain free really seems to help her Frenchie stinkys.
customer_reviews.author: Tamara

customer_reviews.title: Helps keep my dog young and active
customer_reviews.text: Asher loves Beyond grain free. It has glucosamine, which I insist my 7 yr old pup gets enough of. I consider Beyond one of the top 5 brand pet foods.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Acker

customer_reviews.title: The omega and no gluten ...
customer_reviews.text: My dog has a sensitive stomach... she suffers from IBS... this food has really helped her... he stools are firm and the omega is great for her skin since she has skin sensitivities ...
customer_reviews.author: Teha

customer_reviews.title: Unfortunately too greasy
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately too greasy. My dog got oily smelly and started to itch. Never has this happened on the Lamb....but I can't find the Beyond Lamb grain free anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly B.

product_meta.title: Purina Beyond Grain Free, Natural, Adult Dry Dog Food & Toppers
product_meta.description: Style:Dry Food| Flavor Name:Beef & Egg| Size:3 lb. BagGo beyond for your dog when you serve him Purina Beyond Grain Free Beef & Egg Recipe adult dry dog food. Real beef is the #1 ingredient in this tasty recipe, and it's made with recognizable elements you know and trust. Every ingredient in this dry dog food recipe has a purpose, and when working together, they deliver the nutrition plus essential vitamins and minerals your dog needs to help support a long, healthy life with you. We formulate this recipe without corn, wheat, soy or poultry by-product meal, giving him a grain- and gluten-free mealtime option you can feel proud to serve to your dog. This recipe features crunchy kibble that enriches his mealtime experience, plus tender, protein-rich shreds for a genuine flavor that dogs love. Give him a natural meal formulated by a trusted brand that believes there's more to natural dog food than just ingredients when you make this Purina Beyond formula part of his complete and balanced diet.
feature_bullets: One (1) 3 lb. Bag - Purina Beyond Grain Free Beef & Egg Recipe Adult Dry Dog Food
Grain- and gluten-free formula you want for your dog
Includes tender, protein-rich shreds for delicious texture
Made without corn, wheat or soy
